member.name: LVGROUPMETRICS
member.summary: Contains information about the display of groups in a list-view control.

summary.para: Flags that specify which members contain or are to receive valid data. Can be one or more of the following values.

listheader.description: The Left, Top, Right, and Bottom members are valid.

member.name: LVGROUPMETRICS.Left
member.summary: Specifies the width of the left border in icon, small icon, or tile view.

member.name: LVGROUPMETRICS.Top
member.summary: Specifies the width of the top border in all group views.

member.name: LVGROUPMETRICS.Right
member.summary: Specifies the width of the right border in icon, small icon, or tile view.

member.name: LVGROUPMETRICS.Bottom
member.summary: Specifies the width of the bottom border in all group views.

member.name: LVGROUPMETRICS.crLeft
member.summary: Specifies the color of the left border. Not implemented.

member.name: LVGROUPMETRICS.crTop
member.summary: Specifies the color of the top border. Not implemented.

member.name: LVGROUPMETRICS.crRight
member.summary: Specifies the color of the right border. Not implemented.

member.name: LVGROUPMETRICS.crBottom
member.summary: Specifies the color of the bottom border. Not implemented.

member.name: LVGROUPMETRICS.crHeader
member.summary: Specifies the color of the header text. Not implemented.

member.name: LVGROUPMETRICS.crFooter
member.summary: Specifies the color of the footer text. Not implemented.
